value.title: MediaKind unveils new home for Microsoft Azure Media Services users
value.excerpt: Building on what it says are the more than one billion video streams served in 2022 and 2023, MediaKind has unveiled MK/IO, a complete streaming solution built on Microsoft Azure that is said to be ab

value.title: GitHub and others call for more open-source support in EU AI law
value.excerpt: In a paper sent to EU policymakers, a group of companies, including GitHub, Hugging Face, Creative Commons, and others, are encouraging more support for the open-source development of different AI models as they consider finalizing the AI Act. EleutherAI, LAION, and Open Future also cosigned the paper.

value.title: Web3 And AI Startup ZYBER 365 Turns India's 109th Unicorn
value.excerpt: Opinions expressed by Entrepreneur contributors are their own. Web3, AI startup ZYBER 365 raised $100 million in Series A funding at a $1.2 billion valuation from UK-based SRAM & MRAM Group. The funding worth $1.2 billion valuation has earned Web3 ...

value.title: AI could deliver bioweapons capabilities to bad actors, safety chief warns: ‘Grave threat’
value.excerpt: The CEO of an artificial intelligence safety and research company warned the Senate that AI could spread the capacity to build bioweapons if left unchecked.

value.title: Alibaba's cloud unit brings Meta's AI model Llama to its clients
value.excerpt: Alibaba's cloud computing division said it has become the first Chinese enterprise to support Meta's open-source artificial intelligence (AI) model Llama, allowing its Chinese business users to develop programs off the model.

value.title: AWS Reaffirms its Commitment to Responsible Generative AI
value.excerpt: As a pioneer in artificial intelligence and machine learning, AWS is committed to developing and deploying generative AI responsibly As one of the most transformational innovations of our time, generative AI continues to capture the world’s imagination, and we remain as committed as ever to harnessing

value.title: 70% Of Generative AI Startups Rely On Google Cloud, AI Capabilities
value.excerpt: Alphabet's Q2 2023 earnings call highlighted the growing adoption of generative AI across the company's cloud and product offerings.

value.title: Pentagon-Funded Study Uses AI to Detect 'Violations of Social Norms' in Text
value.excerpt: Have you texted someone lately to express guilt over...something? The government probably wants to know about it.

value.title: SK Hynix says memory chip recovery has begun, flags robust AI demand
value.excerpt: South Korea's SK Hynix said on Wednesday the memory chip market was beginning to recover from a deep downturn amid robust artificial intelligence demand that helped it narrow its second-quarter operating loss from the prior quarter's record.

value.title: US senators express bipartisan alarm about AI, focusing on biological attack
value.excerpt: Both Democratic and Republican senators expressed alarm on Tuesday about the potential for a malevolent use of artificial intelligence, focusing on the possibility of AI being used to create a biological attack.

value.title: Microsoft reports $20.1 billion quarterly profit as it promises to lead 'the new AI platform shift'
value.excerpt: The software giant said its fiscal fourth-quarter profit was $20.1 billion, or $2.69 per share, beating analyst expectations for $2.55 per share.

value.title: GE HealthCare CEO on advances in Alzheimer's treatment: 'A breakthrough moment for patients'
value.excerpt: GE HealthCare CEO Peter Arduini discussed his company's role in Alzheimer's treatment with CNBC's Jim Cramer on Tuesday.

value.title: Make The Doctor’s Office Fair! AI Can Help Create A More Equitable Healthcare System
value.excerpt: Bringing a level of scrutiny to AI processes in healthcare, Marzyeh Ghassemi has some solutions for harmful bias in systems that, as a society, we want to root out.

value.title: Stop Crashes! Using AI To Predict Car Crashes, And Make Roads Safer
value.excerpt: “Imagine you put the world's safest driver and the world's best vehicle on our roads,” he said. “There's an inherent level of extrinsic risk caused by other vehicles, caused by the nature of the road geometry, and topology.”

value.title: Indian tech giant Wipro to invest $1B in AI
value.excerpt: 'Where's the evidence?': Democrat reacts to McCarthy's impeachment threat against Biden

value.title: Debunking observability myths – Part 1: Why you can’t skip monitoring and rely only on logs
value.excerpt:
In this blog post, we will shed light on a myth surrounding observability: "You can skip monitoring and rely on logs.”
The post Debunking observability myths – Part 1: Why you can’t skip monitoring and rely only on logs appeared first on IBM Blog.

value.title: I read the news today, oh bot! AI-generated anchors are making headlines in India
value.excerpt: Meet Lisa, a multilingual chatbot who reads the news headlines in India. What, you don't care for her monotone voice? Change the channel! Sana is the other network's AI-generated news anchor.

value.title: NYC is now using AI at some subway stations to track when and how fare evaders are getting through
value.excerpt: The M.T.A. said that the AI is only being used to generate reports and quantify fare evasion, not to identify fare evaders or assist law enforcement.

value.title: A translator for your kids: How using AI as a 'parenting co-pilot' will help parents communicate better
value.excerpt: With ChatGPT and other artificial intelligence tools, mom and dad can now access massive amounts of parenting knowledge at their fingertips.

value.title: Growth driven by AI will be the metric to watch this earnings cycle
value.excerpt: With Alphabet and Microsoft reporting their results today, there's going to be a lot of scrutiny on their investments in AI tech.

value.title: Generative AI Views Of MIT Prof And Goldman CIO Bode Well For Microsoft
value.excerpt: An MIT professor and Goldman's CIO told me GAI has a bright future. It could add $14 billion a year to Microsoft's revenue

value.title: AI is coming for Hollywood. 'It's amazing to see the sophistication of the images,' one of Christopher Nolan's VFX guy says.
value.excerpt: While AI isn't quite ready for prime time, the technology has the potential to make Hollywood VFX artists more creative. It could also come for jobs.

value.title: What generative AI really means for the economy, jobs and education

value.title: Wayfair unveils generative AI solution to reimagine interior design
value.excerpt: Online furniture retailer Wayfair today launched Decorify, a generative AI tool for interior design inspiration.

value.title: Meta’s stock picks up an upgrade ahead of earnings — but AI is the biggest driver
value.excerpt: It isn't lost on New Street Research analyst Dan Salmon that he's upgrading shares of Meta Platforms Inc. a day before the company is due to report earnings.
